name: Modular Belt Conveyor
description: This conveyor is designed with light-weight components that run on low power. Hence it requires minimal support structures and also reduces energy costs.
features: Our design enables easy replacement of even tiny components.
Pre-engineered styles prevent dirt accumulation below the belt.
The positive drive mechanism eliminates spillage and makes it suitable for wet applications.

name: Slat Chain Conveyor
description: Built with stainless steel to maintain hygiene and remain robust, this conveyorhas been specially designed to be used in manufacturing units and bottling plants.
features: Our internal and external components are constructed using AISI 304 Stainless Steel
The stainless steel fittings make the conveyor operate at a variable speed
Made using standard components for easy replacement

name: Bucket Elevator Conveyor
description: The Bucket Elevator Conveyor has been designed to run efficiently to its maximum power capacity and offer high operational reliability.
features: The chain and pendulum type bucket designs in both horzontal and vertical designs are available to convey a wide range of materials
Traditional designs with bucket overlap and alternative designs without bucket overlap are also available.

name: Crate Handling Conveyor
description: The highly durable and robust Crate Handling Conveyor with improved mechanical strength has been designed to be on par with the industry standards in order to get an efficient output.
features: Specially crafted using stainless steel to work in a wet environment, particularly for use in the dairy industry
Uses cutiing-edge technology and sturdy construction.

name: Cooling Tunnel
description: Our pasteurizers are designed and fabricated using stainless steel and propylene belt with dual mesh filtration. We use highly efficient thermal machines with the latest thermodynamic technology for temperature control.
features: Designed effectively for inhibiting pathogens and micro-organisms and also for halting the growth of yeast.
Transfer of the bottle is smotth because of the dynamic transfer system.

name: Fruit & Vegetable Washer
description: We have specially designed this conveyor system for washing variously leafy vegetables and fruits. It supports agitation in water for dirt removal, air agitation for drying and spraying freshwater.
features: Our internal and external components are constructed using AISI 304 steel
The stainless steel fittings make the conveyor operate at a variable speed
Perforated steel designs are used for easy insertion and removal

name: Belt Conveyor
features: Rugged system for handling a variety of load types.
Transfer of the bottle is smooth because of the dynamic transfer reduction.

name: Truck Loading Conveyor
features: Slider bed design for all kinds of applications.
Assists in the rapid movement of materials.
Saves time & money through automatin and labor reduction.

name: Roller Conveyor
features: It can convey loads mounted on a decline angle.
Cost Effective solution.
Used for multiple work stations.

name: Spiral Conveyor
features: Compact construction to save the floor space.
Transports all the meat and dairy products in a circular/spiral mode.
A variety of frozen products can be conveyed easily.

name: Wire Mesh Conveyor
features: Enclosed bottom pan with high slide rails.
High-quality chain-driven metal mesh belts are used.
Ideal for heal-treated, washed and quenched parts.

name: Flexible Chain Conveyor
features: Made of Aluminium and offers low friction for multi-flexing.
All components of the conveyor can be easily fitted using simple hand tools.
Has excellent tensile strength and is corrosion resistant.

name: Collapsible Roller Conveyor
features: Made from premium grade raw materials.
Widely trusted for efficient conveying of packages.
Portable and also suitable for handling odd-sized boxes.

name: Warehouse Conveyor
features: Robust construction to withstand heavy load.
Only less maintenance is required.
Can be used for conveying different sized and weights.
